21  package org.opencastproject.external.endpoint;
22  
23  import static io.restassured.RestAssured.given;
24  import static java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
25  import static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.SC_NO_CONTENT;
26  import static javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse.SC_OK;
27  import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
28  import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull;
29  import static org.junit.Assert.assertThat;
30  import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
31  import static org.junit.Assert.fail;
32  import static org.opencastproject.test.rest.RestServiceTestEnv.testEnvForClasses;
33  
34  import org.opencastproject.capture.CaptureParameters;
35  import org.opencastproject.external.util.AclUtils;
36  import org.opencastproject.external.util.SchedulingUtils;
37  import org.opencastproject.index.service.util.RequestUtils;
38  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackage;
39  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.MetadataJson;
40  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.MetadataList;
41  import org.opencastproject.security.api.AccessControlList;
42  import org.opencastproject.test.rest.RestServiceTestEnv;
43  
44  import com.entwinemedia.fn.data.Opt;
45  
46  import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
47  import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
48  import org.junit.AfterClass;
49  import org.junit.BeforeClass;
50  import org.junit.Test;
51  
52  import java.io.File;
53  import java.io.IOException;
54  import java.util.Map;
55  
56  import uk.co.datumedge.hamcrest.json.SameJSONAs;
57  
58  public class EventsEndpointTest {
59    private static final RestServiceTestEnv env = testEnvForClasses(TestEventsEndpoint.class);
60  
61     @BeforeClass
62     public static void oneTimeSetUp() {
63       env.setUpServer();
64     }
65  
66     @AfterClass
67     public static void oneTimeTearDown() {
68       env.tearDownServer();
69     }
70  
71    @Test
72    public void testDeserializationOfAcl() throws IOException, ParseException {
73      String emptyAclJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/acl-empty.json"), UTF_8);
74      AccessControlList acl = AclUtils.deserializeJsonToAcl(emptyAclJson, false);
75      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().size(), 0);
76  
77      // Test acl with one entry
78      String oneAclJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/acl-one.json"), UTF_8);
79      acl = AclUtils.deserializeJsonToAcl(oneAclJson, false);
80      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().size(), 1);
81      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().get(0).getAction(), "write");
82      assertTrue(acl.getEntries().get(0).isAllow());
83      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().get(0).getRole(), "ROLE_ADMIN");
84  
85      // Test acl with many entries
86      String manyAclJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/acl-many.json"), UTF_8);
87      acl = AclUtils.deserializeJsonToAcl(manyAclJson, false);
88      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().size(), 2);
89      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().get(0).getAction(), "write");
90      assertTrue(acl.getEntries().get(0).isAllow());
91      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().get(0).getRole(), "ROLE_ADMIN");
92  
93      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().get(1).getAction(), "read");
94      assertTrue(acl.getEntries().get(1).isAllow());
95      assertEquals(acl.getEntries().get(1).getRole(), "ROLE_USER");
96    }
97  
98    @Test
99    public void testDeserializeMetadataFields() throws IOException, ParseException {
100     String manyAclJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-metadata.json"), UTF_8);
101     Map<String, String> fields = RequestUtils.getKeyValueMap(manyAclJson);
102     assertEquals(3, fields.size());
103 
104     assertEquals("Captivating title - edited", fields.get("title"));
105     assertEquals("What this is about - edited", fields.get("subject"));
106     assertEquals("A great description - edited", fields.get("description"));
107 
108     String updateMetadataJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-metadata-update.json"), UTF_8);
109     fields = RequestUtils.getKeyValueMap(updateMetadataJson);
110     assertEquals(5, fields.size());
111     assertEquals("Captivating title - edited", fields.get("title"));
112     assertEquals("What this is about - edited", fields.get("subject"));
113     assertEquals("", fields.get("description"));
114 
115     String updateInvalidMetadataJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-metadata-update-invalid.json")
116             , UTF_8);
117     try {
118       fields = RequestUtils.getKeyValueMap(updateInvalidMetadataJson);
119       fail();
120     } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
121       assertNotNull(e);
122     }
123   }
124 
125   @Test
126   public void testUpdateEventMetadata() throws IOException {
127     String jsonString = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-update.json"), UTF_8);
128     String expectedJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-update-expected.json"), UTF_8);
129     String eventId = TestEventsEndpoint.UPDATE_EVENT;
130     given().multiPart("metadata", jsonString).pathParam("event_id", eventId).expect().statusCode(SC_NO_CONTENT)
131             .when().post(env.host("{event_id}"));
132     MetadataList actualMetadataList = TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedMetadataList1().getValue();
133     assertThat(MetadataJson.listToJson(actualMetadataList, true).toString(), SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(expectedJson).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
134   }
135 
136   @Test
137   public void testGetAllEventMetadata() throws IOException {
138     String expectedJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-metadata-expected.json"), UTF_8);
139     String eventId = TestEventsEndpoint.METADATA_GET_EVENT;
140     String result = given().pathParam("event_id", eventId).expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when().get(env.host("{event_id}/metadata")).asString();
141     assertThat(result, SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(expectedJson).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
142   }
143 
144   @Test
145   public void testUpdateEventMetadataByType() throws IOException {
146     String jsonString = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-metadata-update.json"), UTF_8);
147     String expectedJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-metadata-update-expected.json"), UTF_8);
148     String eventId = TestEventsEndpoint.METADATA_UPDATE_EVENT;
149     given().formParam("metadata", jsonString).pathParam("event_id", eventId).queryParam("type", "dublincore/episode")
150             .expect().statusCode(SC_NO_CONTENT).when().put(env.host("{event_id}/metadata"));
151     MetadataList actualMetadataList = TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedMetadataList2().getValue();
152     assertThat(MetadataJson.collectionToJson(actualMetadataList.getMetadataByFlavor("dublincore/episode"), true).toString(),
153             SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(expectedJson).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
154   }
155 
156   /**
157    * Test GET /{event_id}/scheduling.
158    */
159   @Test
160   public void testGetEventScheduling() throws IOException {
161     String expectedJson = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-scheduling-expected.json"), UTF_8);
162     String eventId = TestEventsEndpoint.SCHEDULING_GET_EVENT;
163     String result = given().pathParam("event_id", eventId).expect().statusCode(SC_OK).when()
164         .get(env.host("{event_id}/scheduling")).asString();
165     assertThat(result, SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(expectedJson).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
166   }
167 
168   /**
169    * Test PUT /{event_id}/scheduling.
170    */
171   @Test
172   public void testUpdateEventScheduling() throws IOException {
173     String jsonString = IOUtils.toString(getClass().getResource("/event-scheduling-update.json"), UTF_8);
174     String eventId = TestEventsEndpoint.SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT;
175     given().formParam("scheduling", jsonString).pathParam("event_id", eventId)
176         .expect().statusCode(SC_NO_CONTENT).when().put(env.host("{event_id}/scheduling"));
177 
178     SchedulingUtils.SchedulingInfo schedulingInfo = new SchedulingUtils.SchedulingInfo();
179     schedulingInfo.setAgentId(Opt.nul(TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedAgentId().getValue().get()));
180     schedulingInfo.setStartDate(Opt.nul(TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedStartDate().getValue().get()));
181     schedulingInfo.setEndDate(Opt.nul(TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedEndDate().getValue().get()));
182     if (TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedAgentConfig().getValue().isPresent()) {
183       schedulingInfo.setInputs(Opt.some(TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedAgentConfig()
184           .getValue().get().get(CaptureParameters.CAPTURE_DEVICE_NAMES)));
185     }
186     assertThat(schedulingInfo.toJson().toString(), SameJSONAs.sameJSONAs(jsonString).allowingAnyArrayOrdering());
187   }
188 
189   @Test
190   public void testUpdateFlavorWithTrack() {
191     String eventId = TestEventsEndpoint.TRACK_UPDATE_EVENT;
192     given().multiPart("track", new File(getClass().getResource("/event-track-update-file.vtt").getFile()), "text/vtt")
193             .pathParam("event_id", eventId)
194             .formParam("flavor", "captions/source+en")
195             .formParam("overwriteExisting", true)
196             .expect().statusCode(SC_OK)
197             .when().post(env.host("{event_id}/track"));
198     MediaPackage capturedMediaPackage = TestEventsEndpoint.getCapturedMediaPackage().getValue();
199     assertEquals(capturedMediaPackage.getTracks().length, 1);
200   }
